div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 734 Ioan Corvin (formerly Cuzgun) c. (287, 1105) 37 km. E of Calarasi, Rumania, 1905 Burial: c. 330-320 B.C. (T) Contents: 7 EL, 200+ AR Apollonia Pontica: 21+ tetrob.; diob. Mesembria: 16+ diob. Callatis: dr. Istrus: dr. Cyzicus: 7 EL st. Parium: 2+ dr. (incuse rev.) Disposition: formerly Grand Duke Alex- ander Mikhailovich (7 Cyzicus) and von Renner (some AR) von Renner, Zeitschrift für Münz- und Medaillen- kunde 1906, pp. 97-106, illus. Moisil, CNA 1923, p. 18; Buletinul stiintific 1950, p. 55
